channel.title: Gauntlet Con 2019: Volunteer GM Applications
channel.description:
Gauntlet Con is coming! We're looking for GMs and other volunteers (including helpdesk, organizer support, and panelists). Gauntlet Con is an entirely online convention that runs from Thursday, Oct. 24 through Sunday, Oct. 27.
https://forms.gle/At3kjWgxMYbwethv9
If you need help translating Eastern Daylight Time to your local timezone, check out our time zone spreadsheet that has Gauntlet Con game times in 12 timezones/14 cities:
https://tinyurl.com/gauntletcon2019schedule
![square-gc2019-with-lightning-reduced-4-web_orig|500x500](upload://kWZRdEfpv4tWDLdPXLNPqIYeDd6.jpeg)

item.title: Gauntlet Con 2019: Volunteer GM Applications
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Gauntlet Con is coming! We’re looking for GMs and other volunteers (including helpdesk, organizer support, and panelists). Gauntlet Con is an entirely online convention that runs from Thursday, Oct. 24 through Sunday, Oct. 27.

docs.google.com

Gauntlet Con 2019 Volunteer Information

Thanks for considering volunteering for Gauntlet Con 2019! Gauntlet Con 2019 will take place from Oct. 24 through Oct. 27 in US Eastern Daylight Time. Gauntlet Con is an online convention hosted by The Gauntlet (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/), a...

If you need help translating Eastern Daylight Time to your local timezone, check out our time zone spreadsheet that has Gauntlet Con game times in 12 timezones/14 cities:

https://tinyurl.com/gauntletcon2019schedule
